segments.text: Doctor , can you give me some suggestions on how to stay healthy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , first of all , you need to make sure that you eat the right foods .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are the best foods to eat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should emphasize fresh fruits and vegetables , along with whole grains and protein .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You need to avoid highly fatty and greasy foods . You should also avoid too much sugar and caffeine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What else is important to stay healthy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to get plenty of exercise every day . If you smoke , you need to stop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it OK to drink alcohol ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , studies have shown that people who have one-half a glass of alcohol per day do better than those who don â€™ t drink .
segments.speaker: S2
